name: Medieval towers
description:
Medieval towers is a strategy game in which you play as the leader of a magical squad and have an exciting military adventure.
You have been sent to a swampy area where a ferocious enemy has settled. Capture towers and use their magic as intended.
Depending on the type of tower, warriors can get additional energy or strength, or restore health.
Use the mouse to control the squad.
The goal of the game is to capture all the towers and destroy the enemy on the map.

Game Features:
- Nice graphics.
- 15 interesting levels.
- Several types of enemies with different characteristics.
